Detailed Description

CTreeGraphModel.

Description: The CTreeGraphModel class is a wrapper for the CTreeGraph. It is created to allow QObjects to connect to and recieve signals whenever any class has modified the underlying data.

Limitations: The signals will only be emitted if the CTreeGraphModel is used to edit. If it is bypassed and the CTreeGraph is directly manipulated then there will be no signals sent.

Definition at line 41 of file CTreeGraphModel.h.

STreeNode * CTreeGraphModel::addChildNodeBasic (  STreeNode *  node  ) 
 

CTreeGraphModel::addChildNodeBasic.

Description: This function adds a new child node to the given node and places it at the origin, without repaint or retrace. Used for adding many children at once.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
A new child node is added to the given node and placed at QPoint(0,0). Canvas and trace are not updated. New child node is returned.
Parameters:
node,: This is a pointer to the parent node for the new child node.
Returns:
STreeNode *: Returns a pointer to the new child node.
Limitations: None

void CTreeGraphModel::addParentNode (  STreeNode *  node  ) 
 

CTreeGraphModel::addParentNode.

Description: This function inserts a new parent node above the given node. If the given node is the root node, the new parent node becomes the new root node. Otherwise, the new parent node becomes a child node of the former parent node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
A node has been inserted as the parent of the indicated node.
Parameters:
node,: This is a pointer to the node to which a new parent node is being added.
Limitations: None

int CTreeGraphModel::findMaxDepth (  STreeNode *  node  ) 
 

CTreeGraphModel::findMaxDepth.

Description: This function finds the maximum depth from the given node. The given node is considered at a depth of 1. Calling this function on the root node gets the depth of the entire tree.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Parameters:
node,: This is a pointer to the node of a subtree which the depth is being found.
Returns:
int: Returns the depth below the given node, and 1 if the given node is a leaf node.
Limitations: None

QPoint CTreeGraphModel::getHistoryPosition (   )  const
 

CTreeGraphModel::getHistoryPosition.

Description: This function returns a QPoint representint the upper left corner of the history table.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Returns:
QPoint: Returns a QPoint representint the upper left corner of the history table.
Limitations: Current hack to return the bottom left corner of the tree rectangle. This is in place because moving the history table is currently not implemented and using the bottom right corner ensures that the tree is never written over.
